title: New: JUDE. – Crystals
body:
This is magnificent.

Florida duo **JUDE.** (Kevin James Neal and Sydney Morris) absolutely knock their debut track out the park, a beautifully produced number, with vocals drawing similarities to Lorde. Swirling synths, and the aforementioned elegant vocals dominate _Crystals_, ultimately creating one of the stand-out tracks of the year thus far. Let the music speak for itself. Expect this to go big-time.
